document_data.name: Ice Bracer
document_data.creator: Clergy of [[Auril]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Ice bracers''' were unique pairs of enchanted [[bracer]]s worn exclusively by specialty [[priest]]s of [[Auril]] called [[chillbringer]]s.<ref name="WaPotR-p67" >
document_data.Powers: These bracers imparted physical protection on the chillbringer as if they were ''[[bracers of defense]]''. Additionally, ice bracers behaved like a ''[[ring of warmth]]'' and protected the wearer from cold from both weather and magical cold-based attacks.
document_data.History: Ice bracers were made by high-ranking clergy of Auril during the [[Feast of the Moon]] using ice taken from the [[Great Glacier]]. The magic infusing the bracers allowed them to last until [[Greengrass]].
